summary: AN ORDINANCE related to consultant contracting; changing filing requirements; redefining the term "consultant;" making technical corrections and updating language; exempting consultant services obtained by the City under a contract executed by a state, agency, or subdivision thereof from additional competitive selection requirements; amending, repealing certain provisions of, and re-codifying Chapter 3.114 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending Section 3.40.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
